name: I Wanna be the Powerman
description:
Athena calls upon Sugi for a great quest to awaken his inner potential. His goal? To climb the ladders of power by fighting mortal and immortal warriors, demons and whole pantheons of gods and eldritch beings becoming the definitive (!) most powerful being above all else.

Many pitfalls await his rise, however.

  • 20+ bosses of varying legend, power and divinity.
  • Classic turn-based RPG gameplay (e.g. ff1).
  • Cthullu-slaying levels.
  • Some memes.

This is the game that will change powerlevel debates in the internet forever.

All similarity of characters from this game to actual copyrighted characters is mere coincidence and/or under fair use.

What is Powerman in the title?

Powerman is a mysterious figure appearing in two internet MSPaint comic strips who's able to tackle any character powerlevel-wise.
